name: Manoj J.
position: Associate Product Manager | GMG | OYO | IIT Kharagpur | Dubai
about: E-commerce product management professional with 5+ years of experience in product management, conversion rate optimization (CRO), product analytics and A/B testing. Currently working as a Associate Product Manager at GMG Sports and primarily responsible for product discovery (Search, Recommendations and Merchandising) & checkout journey charters

current_company.name: GMG
current_company.title: Associate Product Manager | GMG | OYO | IIT Kharagpur | Dubai

positions.subtitle: GMG
positions.description: Drove the optimization of the checkout journey for Sun and Sand Sports, enhancing the cart, address, payment, order confirmation, and login/sign-up pages, resulting in a 16% increase in checkout-to-transaction conversion rate (CTT%)Implemented AI-driven product recommendations, conducted thorough audits of prerequisites and spearheaded enhancements to optimize performance and personalization; resulting into 11% increase in direct revenue recommendation Conducted multiple A/B tests to optimize the ranking relevancy of Product Listing Pages (PLPs), including the development of a new core size coverage attribute, resulting in an overall 12% increase in add-to-cart performanceIntroduced promotional tiles on the Product Details Page (PDP) to display active promotions, leading to a 3% increase in add-to-cart rates and enhancing pricing transparency for usersRedesigned the UI/UX of the search functionality including the no-result page by collaborating with the UI team, significantly improving speed and usability and user retention
positions.title: Associate Product Manager
positions.description_html:
Drove the optimization of the checkout journey for Sun and Sand Sports, enhancing the cart, address, payment, order confirmation, and login/sign-up pages, resulting in a 16% increase in checkout-to-transaction conversion rate (CTT%)

Implemented AI-driven product recommendations, conducted thorough audits of prerequisites and spearheaded enhancements to optimize performance and personalization; resulting into 11% increase in direct revenue recommendation

Conducted multiple A/B tests to optimize the ranking relevancy of Product Listing Pages (PLPs), including the development of a new core size coverage attribute, resulting in an overall 12% increase in add-to-cart performance

Introduced promotional tiles on the Product Details Page (PDP) to display active promotions, leading to a 3% increase in add-to-cart rates and enhancing pricing transparency for users

Redesigned the UI/UX of the search functionality including the no-result page by collaborating with the UI team, significantly improving speed and usability and user retention

positions.subtitle: GMG
positions.description: Developed customer funnel level dashboards to provide real time visibility on user journey, dropoffs and managed product and customer level analyticsPerformed monthly CRO audits to identify user pain-points and enhancement opportunities toimprove conversion and user experience across multiple regions and platformsPlanned and executed 20 different A/B tests to improve sorting logic performance acrossdifferent e-commerce platform leading to 20% increase in average revenue per visitBuilt RFM model using python for customer segmentation to deliver personalised contentbased on user behaviour leading to 8% improvement in retention rate
positions.title: Product Analyst
positions.description_html:
Developed customer funnel level dashboards to provide real time visibility on user journey, drop
offs and managed product and customer level analytics

Performed monthly CRO audits to identify user pain-points and enhancement opportunities to
improve conversion and user experience across multiple regions and platforms

Planned and executed 20 different A/B tests to improve sorting logic performance across
different e-commerce platform leading to 20% increase in average revenue per visit

Built RFM model using python for customer segmentation to deliver personalised content
based on user behaviour leading to 8% improvement in retention rate

positions.subtitle: OYO
positions.description: Designed and launched short term flexi stay for OYO Life during the COVID period, improvedlead to booking conversion by 20%Facilitated launch of the native app and drove feature enhancement for the consumer platformusing A/B test improving leads by 14%Improved lead distribution by 2.25x across PAN India portfolio by launching one click schedule,reducing user input and redesigning ranking algorithmLed the team for pricing and discounting, implemented inventory based, slash pricing, andredesigning of pricing section on App/Web
positions.title: Product Associate
positions.description_html:
Designed and launched short term flexi stay for OYO Life during the COVID period, improved
lead to booking conversion by 20%

Facilitated launch of the native app and drove feature enhancement for the consumer platform
using A/B test improving leads by 14%

Improved lead distribution by 2.25x across PAN India portfolio by launching one click schedule,
reducing user input and redesigning ranking algorithm

Led the team for pricing and discounting, implemented inventory based, slash pricing, and
redesigning of pricing section on App/Web

positions.subtitle: OYO
positions.description: Automated pricing by incorporating competition, cost and value based data into python model, reducing research time by 30% Led the pre-post signing pricing for 2000+ properties spanning across 5 major markets constituting for 65% of total revenue Pioneered creation of tool to divide areas into focus-non focus using python to ensure higher occupancy (~10% ) and higher AMR (~15%) Created Funnels and dashboard for tracking customer journey and identifying drop-off points using Google Analytics and Data Studio Designed automated tools to analyze property, cluster and portfolio level performance using SQL, Python, Data Studio and Google Sheets
positions.title: Pricing Analyst
positions.description_html:
Automated pricing by incorporating competition, cost and value based data into python model, reducing research time by 30%

Led the pre-post signing pricing for 2000+ properties spanning across 5 major markets constituting for 65% of total revenue

Pioneered creation of tool to divide areas into focus-non focus using python to ensure higher occupancy (~10% ) and higher AMR (~15%)

Created Funnels and dashboard for tracking customer journey and identifying drop-off points using Google Analytics and Data Studio

Designed automated tools to analyze property, cluster and portfolio level performance using SQL, Python, Data Studio and Google Sheets

experience.title: Summer Internship - Software Development
experience.description: Automated the processing of invoice by creating software to parse useful information from invoice PDFs and store them into CSV filesMade use of various tools like PDFminer, tabula, tesseract-OCR, regular expression and others to procure the required informationValidated various field using regular expression and used Gooey to create GUI for the application to provide input and output file paths
experience.description_html: Automated the processing of invoice by creating software to parse useful information from invoice PDFs and store them into CSV filesMade use of various tools like PDFminer, tabula, tesseract-OCR, regular expression and others to procure the required informationValidated various field using regular expression and used Gooey to create GUI for the application to provide input and output file paths <!---->
